Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply. I had a mammogram in feb last year. These symptoms only started 10 days ago. Im thinking 2 weeks is too long to wait to be seen so going to phone and ask to speak to my gp on monday morning (she dosent work fridays) & hopefully she will she me sooner.Â  Im sorry to hear you received bad news & hope you are doing well with treatment etc. My cousin was diagnosed this time last year & think thats why im so anxious! Big hugs xx
Posts.Title: I am a bit concerned about a heavy tingling feeling in my right breast...

Posts.Content: For the past week i have had a strange heavy tingling feeling in my right breast feels really uncomfortable. Has anybody with a breast cancer diagnisos experienced the same? There is a history of breast cancer in my family and im really worried. Thank you
Posts.Title: I am a bit concerned about a heavy tingling feeling in my right breast...

Posts.Content: Thanks julia i made an appointment today but cannot get seen by my own gp until 31st january! Its most likely an infection. Will just have to try & not worry! Xx
